task.title: Task: Open database
task.shortdesc: How to open an existing database.

taskbody.prereq: To perform this task, the practice files must be on your computer or a USB stick.

context.p:
Commonly used methods for opening an existing Access database are:
Double click an Access file in the Windows explorer.
Click in the initial screen of Access on a recently used file or choose Open Other Files.
When Access is already open choose File Open .

step.cmd: Open the practice file by one of the methods mentioned above.
